item.title: Hive – Distinct 的实现
item.description: 准备数据 语句 select count, count(distinct uid) from logs group by count; hive> select * from logs; OK a 苹果 3 a 橙子 3 a 烧鸡 1 b 烧鸡 3 hive> select count, count(distinct uid) from logs group by count; 1 1 3 2 根据count分组，计算独立用户数。 计
